title: Nintendo Announces Pac-Man 99, Battle Royale - Kinda Funny Games Daily 04.07.21
description:
Visit http://joinhoney.com/games to get Honey for free.

Blessing and Andy Cortez talk about Nintendo's new online Pac Man game, Xcloud touch controls, and more.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:07:10 - Housekeeping
Our Outriders Review episode of Kinda Funny Gamescast is now live. It’s a STACKED cast including: Greg Miller, Andy Cortez, Snowbichael Michael, Joey Noelle, Kahlief Adams of Spawn On Me, and myself. It features an IN DEPTH discussion of the game and is imo one of our best review discussions yet. Go check that out right now on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames and on podcast services around the globe.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: 
Mick @DaNanoBiologist Abrahamson, Tom Bock, Black Jack, & Trent Berrie
The Roper Report   -
00:08:10 - We’re getting a Pac-Man battle royale - Adam Bankhurst @ IGN
00:16:35 -  Microsoft adds touch controls to a BUNCH of Xbox Cloud Gaming titles - Marie Deallessandri @ GiBiz
00:29:50 - Our suspicions were correct: Sony claims it was MLB’s decision to put its baseball game on Xbox Game Pass - Andy Robinson @ VGC
00:40:40 - EA Patents Adaptive Difficulty System - Matt Purslow @ IGN
00:38:45 -  Ad  
00:47:20 -  Nier Replicant has gone gold
00:50:18 - Out today
 Reader mail   -
00:52:45 - Has Xbox failed in marketing this amazing cheap box?  - The Nano Biologist
00:56:00 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg and Tim

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Blessing - http://www.twitter.com/BlessingJr
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Blessing Adeoye Jr., and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

Background Wall Art by Orioto - https://www.facebook.com/OriotoPosters/

98 other players ghosts are still present as are power pellets and eating one will send ghosts to attack other players at jammer pac-man bumping into one of the jammers will slow you down and make it easier for a ghost to catch up to you and end your run the key to victory in pacman 99 is taking advantage of the sleeping ghosts by chomping them you'll create a ghost train that will provide an all you can eat buffet when you eat a power pellet this allows you to overwhelm opponents andy cortez yeah i know you're a big battle royale person you played some of that super mario bro i think we both played a little bit of super mario 35 when that came out i loved it loved it are you excited for a pac-man 99 no the one thousand percent no 1000 percent no bless here's the thing with me and pac-man pac-man kind of it makes me claustrophobic i i get a a feeling of anxiousness and fear i guess anxiety is more the word i was looking for instead of anxiousness because it's not that's not a word um
